attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its all about leverage. Every nation on the planet has to think about where it makes its income. 

GB Ltd has to re-think its strengths. Innovation coming from top-end educational institutions and the high-degree of Anglophilia around the world (trust me I have lived all over the world, Asians specially want to buy into UK products and imagery). Also do not underestimate tourism, both literal and financial. Every middle-class Chinese, Indian, Nigerian etc, wants to visit the UK, and would love to have "a little place in London". Come on people, lets make this happen.

I am British Muslim, living abroad, but coming back...

rejection.details: Please be more specific in the title of your petition about exactly what action you would like the government to take. At the moment the title of your petition is too general.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
